reviews.text: Logement. ....lire bien les détails et vérifier la description du logement avant de se lancer à le louer. Même pour un cour séjour.
reviews.name: Patrick

reviews.text: Amis voyageurs, passez votre chemin. Cette prestation ne correspond en rien à l'esprit R'BnB que nous affectionnons tous !!! il s'agit plus d'un marchand de sommeil dans des conditions lamentables, dans la mesure de mes propos hélas.
reviews.name: Franck

reviews.text: Attention logement situé au 4éme etages en haut d'un restaurant. Ce n'est pas un studio mais une chambre avec douche et wc sur le palier. Attention au ménage pour notre part il n'vais pas du tout été fait et depuis très lgt. Le lit n'est pas en bon état, la serrure non plus, les prises sont arrachés....Perso je déconseille largement même pour le prix et l'emplacement. Dommage
reviews.name: Fanny

reviews.text: La chambre sympa en centre-ville, en proximité de la gare et Cité. L'acces un peu compliqué, mais pour le séjour court idéal.
reviews.name: Jan

reviews.text: Le logement est pratique pour 1 nuit mais pas plus , le prix étant très correct , il me semble que la propreté est négligée par endroit ce qui est dommage et quelques aménagement pourrait être fait dans la salle d'eau . (porte-manteau) De plus le lit est en mauvais état ainsi que la poignet de porte de la chambre ( on reste bloqué si on la ferme trop fort ). Les odeurs sont désagréable car le logement est situé au dessus d'un fast-food , ce qui n'est pas précisé. Nous avons été tout de même bien accueillis !
reviews.name: Sarah

reviews.text: Le logement est bien situé
reviews.name: Helene

reviews.text: Et bien, c'est le moins cher. Ne vous attendez pas à un palace mais, peintures un peu vieilles mais une deco sympa, un lit plutôt confortable. Rue bruyante au matin mais des gens accueillants. Pour le prix, recommandé pour des courts séjours.
reviews.name: Hugo

reviews.text: Un logement avec un rapport qualité prix tout à fait adapté, petit restau au rdc pour se fair un bon petit hamburger, juste pas de coin cuisine, et un mini lavabo sur les toilettes mais en tout cas une nuit trés tranquille et des hoites chaleureux, je recommande
reviews.name: Sébastien

reviews.text: Appartement propre et très bien situé, à 10min de la cité et à 3 de la gare. La rue est calme. Je recommande
reviews.name: Julien

reviews.text: Logement très bien situé et agréable, proche de tout et pourtant très calme.
reviews.name: Tina

reviews.text: Logement idéalement situé; mais la chambre avec le sabre en photo se trouve au dernier étage et non premier avec un escalier raide et étroit. De plus ampoule grillée dans les escaliers. L'entrée par le restaurant peut simple; verrou au sol. Hôte sympathique.
reviews.name: Anaïs

reviews.text: Hôtes très sympathiques, et aux petits soins ;-)
reviews.name: Carine

reviews.text: Un logement économique pour les courts séjours.
reviews.name: Claire

reviews.text: Très sale pas de lumière dans couloir problème eau chaude frigo très bruyant impossible de dormir pas de TV
reviews.name: Maria

reviews.text: Chambre avec salle de bain attenante non un studio, pas au premier étage mais au dernier dans immeuble avec commerce au rez-de-chaussée. Très confortable et bien situé (commerces à moins de 5 minutes et visite de la cité faisable à pied). Pas d'eau chaude pendant le séjour.
reviews.name: Amelie

reviews.text: Chambre parfaite juste pour dormir et un bon rapport qualité prix. Pour se sentir bien dans une ville par contre, c'est un peu limite au niveau accueil et qualité des infrastructures (lit, chauffage, douche et toilette.)
reviews.name: Quentin

reviews.text: Tout était très bien. Simon est un super Hôte. Dommage que le "coin cuisine" se résume à un mini réfrigérateur. Un espace de cuisson serait la bienvenue ! ;)
reviews.name: Romain

reviews.text: Rapport qualité prix ok. Suffit pour une seule nuit. Très mal isolé, beaucoup de bruit du au passage dans la rue. Accueil chaleureux.
reviews.name: Corentin

reviews.text: Nice place, close to city's central
reviews.name: Minh-Tien

reviews.text: Overall good value of money, but the host was difficult to contact and not responsive, also the door was difficult to lock/unlock.
reviews.name: Chi Kin

reviews.text: The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
reviews.name: François

reviews.text: Simon's house is in the center of Carcasson. Good location and a very nice house. Simon is a very nice host and he works a lot. He started his own business and I know how hard it is. Good luck with this. We really appreciate our stay and recommend Simon's place.
reviews.name: Benjamin

reviews.text: The location is a bit far from the castle and I being locked in the room during all morning. Because the door broke. And Simon gave me 10euros for apolozise. And the room is on the restaurant, you have to wait untill 7:00p.m if you want to check in. And He answer me late.. but the room is nice.
reviews.name: 소연

reviews.text: Basic room that was comfortable and quiet. Very central and easy to explore the town. Couldn't get hold of Simon but check in was easy via the people at the burger bar! Just what it says on the tin!
reviews.name: Emma

reviews.text: was very ok for the price
reviews.name: Daniele

reviews.text: It was a good place to stay 1 night for a low price
reviews.name: Rafael

reviews.text: This was a good place to stay, the wifi is not strong and the host took awhile to write back after I wrote to him. I recommend this place but there's some things I wish I had known beforehand 1. It's above a burger restaurant. 2. Talk to the waitress to get room assignment. 3. Don't mess with the door handle only the lock (lock is perfectly secure). 4. Hot water works but you have to forcefully turn handle for it to do anything.
reviews.name: Matthew

reviews.text: Simon was a great host. He responded to my messages quickly. The room itself was very nice and in the middle of everything. I would happily recommend it to anyone.
reviews.name: Sinan

reviews.text:
The best thing about this place is its location. Right between (and within walking distance of) the train station and the castle. Other than that, we would not recommend staying here. The wifi didn't work once the entire time, basic amenities (such as hand soap, dishes/cutlery, and toilet paper) were not provided, despite trying to reach out to the host (didn't get a response). Very dusty and VERY loud, right by a busy street, over a restaurant, and lots of people in the building. Our door handle as lock was falling apart. We had extreme difficulty getting in and out of our room, even to just go to the bathroom. The door handle is also very loud. The mini fridge was unusable, as it sounded like you were dragging bricks over a concrete floor, so it couldn't be plugged in while you were in the room. The shower was really difficult to use. Overall, if you stay here do it for a shorter time and for the location only; we ran into a lot of problems.
+ Plus
reviews.name: Abby

reviews.text: My stay was good, but I haven't contact with Simon via mail and phone :(
reviews.name: LUkasz

reviews.text:
Simon is a really friendly young man, but very difficult to contact and communicate with (including 'not seeing' a request to cancel one of the nights I had booked, within the cancellation policy, and asking me to still pay for half of it on the day I arrived). The room and bathroom wasn't very clean, and I found it very difficult to lock/unlock the front restaurant door (the lock is at the bottom of the door, so you have to crouch down on the street), and didn't enjoy the experience of having to enter and exit through the burger restaurant. The furniture was very cheap and old, and overall, I felt like this was 'student' accommodation, not really 'stylish' as stated in the description. The location is great however, and for the price, I guess it was ok, however I found the whole experience not really what I was expecting, and unfortunately a bit disappointing. Better communication, attention to some details, and a more accurate description would have made this a much better experience.
+ Plus
reviews.name: Mei Lai

reviews.text: The location is excellent. Seconds from Carnot Square with lovely bars and restaurants. There are lots of stairs to this room as it is on the top floor so not advisable for those with mobility issues. Wi-Fi is also not receptive on this level. The shower was excellent. I meet Simon and Marin and they were both very friendly and easy going. The road leads to the square and can be noisy late at night. Overall this is good value in what is a very expensive area.
reviews.name: Anna

reviews.text: Very central good value place. You basically stay on top floor of a restaurant. Fridge near the bed at nights make noise that will disturb you a lot. Small details are not all good but bearing the location and price all good.
reviews.name: Sina

reviews.text: It was a good place according to the price.
reviews.name: Mónica

reviews.text: Good location, the apartment is above the restaurant. No wifi, but it's a simply clean apartment.
reviews.name: Joshua

reviews.text: The room is over a restaurant. The host provided us 10% as guest there
reviews.name: Tobias

reviews.text: The house is well located. The kitchen is far from the room and part of the restaurant, so not very accessible. The room is cousy and Simon is helpful when requested. There are a lot of stairs.
reviews.name: Gabriel
